name: Lost Kingdom R2 Volume 1
description:
So basically I already "here" everyone saying "Why are you making more of this." Well, 1. I improved as a writer and artist and don't misspell everything anymore. 2. Because it never got finished and needs to be finished.

So basically about development. Most of the time spend was made in the Database, so when I draw everything, things would keep popping up sooner and sooner. (Also... This isn't a remake... You'll understand when you play it. And another thing... Go to the picture files)

Also if you encounter a crash. Good, this is at the stage where bug reports are essential to make this work. That's why there's playtester events like the chicken.

Here's the main plugin developer: https://github.com/belmoussaoui/Tacti...

It's by arleq1n. Thanks.
